Detailed Description

Structure given as an argument for SAX callbacks to retrieve information about parsing status.

Field Documentation

◆ line_num

int line_num

Current line number being processed.

const SXML_CHAR* name

Document name (file name or buffer name).

Data source [DataSourceFile|DataSourceBuffer]. Depends on type.
